attributes.review: I was excited to use this app but then I got a pop-up that said to leave. I was like what? To where? Then a prerecorded message played that said “Go back to China.” They used facial recognition software to tell that I was Asian. They didn’t even ask me permission to use my front camera smh. The app then began blaring an alarm that was so ear-splitting that my dog started barking. I kept trying to turn the alarm off and then my phone suddenly burst into flames. I’m typing this from an Android.
attributes.title: Overall bad :(

attributes.review: so I went on my phone and got this then I looked at my ostrich then looked back at my phone and it was gone then I asked my pet ostrich to look for it but then the ostrich could not find it so I asked my 20 yr old grandma then she walked in my room and stepped in the ostriches poop so then she had to clean it off so I asked my 69 yr old baby sister and she looked everywhere including the basement where I am hiding  a few dogs (gen z knows what I mean by that) in my basement but they said they could not find it either then my ostrich started choking them we rode my mom to the vet then they cut the ostrich open then found the phone then I deleted the app
attributes.title: my ostrich ate my phone bc of this
This is just an app of oranges.

attributes.review: I downloaded this app yesterday and my phone hasn’t been the same since mind you my phone had been working with no problems for the 11 months I had it, I’m pretty the app gives your phone a virus . It even disabled my camera, I’m most likely going to have to get a new phone.It’s an awful app and I don’t recommend you download it.
attributes.title: It is the worst app I’ve ever downloaded .
